column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ramsay - Thank you for your great review. I'm so glad to hear we are your favorite ramen spot. We greatly appreciate it. We will be opening a very large JINYA off FM1960 in the new year
column2: so hopefully that will alleviate some of the heavy crowds at Midtown. We'll see. But thank you again for the kind words
column3: and we look forward to your next visit.
